disclaimer.p1: Click on the "Login to Spotify" button in the upper-left corner, connect to your Spotify account, then click "Okay" to grant authorization to this app.
disclaimer.p2: This app shows the lyrics of the track currently playing on your Spotify account. The left-side menu allows you to also see the lyrics for your recently played tracks or to go back to your currently playing track.
disclaimer.p3: Although cookies are used to keep track of your Spotify account, no information is collected or saved.
